loans.use: To buy soap to establish a new business

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлуда проживает в городе Нурек. Она замужем. Ей 27 лет. У нее двое детей. Мавлуда имеет среднее образование. Она два года как занимается торговлей. У нее имеется собственный магазин, где она продает детскую одежду. Мавлуда берет кредит для покупки детской осенней обуви и одежды.
texts.en: Mavluda lives in the city of Nurek. She is 27 years old, married, and has 2 children. Mavluda has a high school education. For the past two years, she has been working in retail. She has her own shop where she sells children's clothing. Mavluda is now seeking a loan with which to buy children's clothing and footwear for the autumn season.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing and footwear for autumn

loans.name: Doris

texts.es: Doris, de 53 años, es una mujer emprendedora y que no le tiene miedo a los retos, está casada y tiene cuatro hijos a quienes crió y educó hasta convertirlos en personas de buen actuar para la sociedad, vive en su casa propia a lado de su esposo y una nieta de 16 años a quien cría y educa ya que sus padres están fuera de la ciudad trabajando. Doris, tiene como trabajo la venta de bebidas al por menor, el carro repartidor de una empresa cervecera de la ciudad se encarga de proveerle directamente de la planta hasta su local de atención que está ubicado en su propia casa. Realiza la venta directa de las bebidas y la atención a su público gracias a que cuenta con algunas mesas y sillas en donde atiende cómodamente a sus consumidores. Lleva trabajando en esta actividad  más de 15 años y lo hace con ayuda de su esposo, además tiene otros negocios complementarios como la venta de golosinas y de balones de gas que también le generan buenos ingresos. Le gusta lo que hace, pues brinda servicios de calidad a sus clientes con mucha responsabilidad y medidas de seguridad complementarias, además con todo lo que ofrece puede tener buenas ventas y con esto mejorar los ingresos que necesita en la economía de su hogar, desea seguir trabajando y más adelante agrandar su establecimiento. Este es el crédito número 4 con MFP, agradece a quienes le brindan la oportunidad para acceder a este crédito financiero que le brinda la seguridad para continuar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que no desea dejar una imagen negativa en los miembros de su grupo que se caracterizan por la puntualidad y responsabilidad en sus pagos. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mas bebidas y golosinas para continuar con su venta en su negocio ya que desea ampliar las opciones a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Doris is 53 years old and is a very enterprising woman who is not afraid of challenges.  She is married and has four children whom she raised and educated and made them benefits to society.  She lives in a home of her own along with her husband and one 16 year old granddaughter, who she also raises and educates because her parents work away from the city.

Doris sells drinks in small quantities.  A beer company delivery truck from town delivers directly to her store, located in her home.  She sells directly to the public, thanks to some tables and chairs that she has where she can tend to her customers in a comfortable atmosphere.

She’s been doing this for 15 years and works together with her husband.  She also has other complementary businesses that generate good profits, such as snack sales and balloon sales.  She likes what she does and provides quality service to her customers in a very responsible and secure manner.  Everything she offers allows her to have good sales and increase the income that she needs in her home.  She wants to keep working and expand her establishment in the future.

This will be her fourth loan through MFP and she appreciates those who provide her opportunity through this loan that allows her to continue with her work.  She promises to make her payments on time because she doesn’t want to leave a negative impression on the other members of the group, known for being responsible and making payments on time.  She will use the 1,500 PEN from this loan to buy drinks and snacks so that she can continue her business and offer more options to her customers.

loans.use: to buy drinks and snacks.

loans.name: Kim's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area of the Ou Reang Ov district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia, Kim is a 60-year-old widowed mother of three children. 

To make a living, she has been farming rice on one-hectare of farmland, and growing cassava (similar to yuca) on two-hectare of farmland. She has been doing this for twenty years. She is able to earn about 18,000KHR per day and manages to save about 8,000KHR each day after expenses. The low price of cassava is still the main challenge.

This is the first microloan for Kim’s group with VisionFund. Now leading the group of two to request a loan, Kim, will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farm, and will use a portion of it to plow the field. She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthfully to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Chanthoun's Group

texts.en:
Chanthoun, 23, lives in a rural area of the Ou Reang Ov district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She has one son, who is dependent on her and too young for schooling. She has farmed rice for almost twenty years. The current business earns her about 20,000 KHR per day and she manages to save about 5,000 KHR each day after deducting daily expenses. 

This is the first microloan for Chanthoun’s group with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. The group of two is applying for a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend on labor fees. She hopes this loan will help her to increase more income from her paddy so as to make a living better.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Nosirjon

texts.en:
Nosirjon is 36 years old and he is a hardworking man with a great desire to progress in life. His lifetime’s partner is a business lady, and they have 2 children. They live in the house he has succeeded in building thanks to his great dedication.

He is one of the successful businessmen of his town. For more than 6 years he has been busy with selling sewing machines. He knows all aspects of his business very well. His experiences and skills help him to develop business and in this way improve his living conditions. His wife helps him with the business. He wants to develop the business further but his income is small and he needs to your help and mercy.

This is the first loan he is requesting from MLO. He is asking for a loan of 3000 USD to buy sewing machine to sell. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy sewing machines to sell

loans.name: Rajabaly

texts.en:
Rajabaly is 20 years old. He is a hard-working man. He is single and lives with his parents and brother. He sells a variety of clothes. He acquires his products in a market in the city. He began working this way more than two years ago because he needed to earn money. His brother helps him to purchase his merchandise. He is asking for a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy more clothes to sell.
This is his first loan with IMON International, and he is grateful for the financial support in helping him to realize his plans. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Haydaraly

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Haydaraly works hard to support his family. He has a clothing sales business in Tajikistan, which he has had for 15 years. 
Haydaraly has been sustaining his business activities through three past loans from IMON International. He hopes that his hard work will help him attain his dream of saving enough money. In the future, Haydaraly hopes to improve his business in order to provide for the education of his children. He is asking for a loan of 1,200 USD to buy more clothes to sell. Haydaraly is deeply grateful to KIVA lenders who will support him.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Twubake Ii Group

texts.fr:
Pascasie fait partie du groupe Twubake II et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle est mariée à Viator, un maçon. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants âgés de 3 à 9 ans tous étudient. 
Elle prend soin de 3 personnes dont 2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de bière 'Primus' dans son bar depuis  7 ans. 

Elle est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter   5 casiers de bière 'Primus' Supplémentaires. Toute   la bière achetée,  sera  revendue  pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait avoir la capacité de satisfaire les besoins de sa famille et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Pascasie is a member of the Twubake group.  She lives in Bujumbura.  

She is married to Viator, a mason.  Together, they have 2 children, ages 3 and 9, who both go to school.

She takes care of three people, two of whom attend school.

She has been in the business of selling “Primus” beer at her bar for seven years.   She is on her third loan with Turame.  With the KIVA loan that she will receive, she will increase her capital and buy five extra cases of “Primus” beer.   All of the beer that she buys will be sold to increase her income.  

In the years to come, she would like to be able to meet the needs of her family and to see them study at school.

loans.use: to buy 5 extra cases of "Primus" beer.  All beer bought will be sold to increase income.

loans.name: Gerson

texts.es: Gerson, de 30 años, es un hombre bueno, creativo y amable, es conviviente con Rubí de 30 años y con ella tiene cuatro hijos, Xiomara de 12, Inda de 5, Joel de 4 y Jeremy de 7 meses de nacido, vive en casa de sus padres en donde le habilitaron un espacio y pudo construir una pequeña vivienda en donde cobija a su familia. Gerson, tiene como trabajo la carpintería, es un hombre prodigioso con sus manos, pues puede convertir cualquier pedazo de madera en una obra de arte y también construye casas muy hermosas y elegantes. Poco a poco aprendió a desarrollar su trabajo gracias a las enseñanzas de un gran maestro de obras quien siempre lo orientó para no cometer errores. Trabaja en esta actividad por más de 4 años y lo realiza siempre con mucho esmero y dedicación porque sabe que con eso sustenta a su familia. Adicionalmente vende hielo y gaseosas, en algunas ocasiones también comparte la venta de abarrotes con su cónyuge quien lleva a otros pueblos todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad. Le gusta lo que hace pues expresa sus sentimientos en cada obra o edificación que realiza, además tiene buenos ingresos económicos que le permiten brindar tranquilidad en cuanto a la alimentación y educación para su familia, desea seguir trabajando para mas adelante poner un taller implementado en su casa. Este es el crédito número 4 con MFP, está muy contento por el apoyo financiero que le están brindando ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a continuar pagando puntualmente sus cuotas tal como le programen, está muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará materiales y herramientas para seguir haciendo su trabajo, además implementara su stock de ventas con la compra de algunas bebidas ya que no desea quedarse sin productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: Gerson, 30, is a good man, friendly and creative.  He and his wife, Rubi, 30, have four children: Xiomara, 12; Inda, 5; Joel, 4; and Jeremy, 7 months.  They live with Gerson's parents, in rooms that have been carved out for their own use.  Gerson operates a carpentry business.  He is good with his hands and can turn any piece of wood into a work of art.  He also builds houses.  He developed his skills over several years, working for a master builder who always insisted on doing every job the right way.  He worked with the builder for 4 years, picking up the skills that he knew he would need to support his family.  Gerson also sells ice and soft drinks and helps his wife with her retail business.  They stock the retail business with staple products that they buy from markets in other towns and resell locally.  He likes what he does, he says, because the jobs and buildings that he works on are, in part, the results of his creative bent.  He makes a good living, as well.  For the future, he wants to set up a carpentry shop in his house.  This is Gerson's 4th MFP loan.  He says that he is grateful for your support because your loans have helped him to build his businesses.  He says, too, that he is committed to repaying the loan in the agreed-upon time.  Gerson will use part of this 1200 soles loan to buy tools and materials for his carpentry business and the rest to stock his drinks business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his carpentry business.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en: Swine-raising is the business of almost all people in Namnama Alfonso Lista, according to Philip. But the biggest contributor of income comes primarily from the farming business. Philip has raised two swine for fattening. He aims to increase the number of his swine and provide them proper nutrition, but he struggles with shortage of capital due to the high cost of farming supplies he has purchased. With regards to his situation, he is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to allow him to buy the necessary livestock feed and vaccines. In turn, he hopes to help his two siblings in their studies. In addition, he hopes to help his parents in generating greater income for their daily needs.

loans.use: to buy the necessary livestock feed and vaccines for his swine

loans.name: Jumakhal

texts.ru:
Жумахал жительница района Шахритус. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Ее муж работает таксистом. Жумахал не имеет высшего образования. Она занимается растениеводством. У Жумахал при доме имеется не большой участок земли, где она выращивает овощи и бахчевые культуры. Этим видом деятельности Жумахал занимается пятнадцать лет. 
Жумахал просит кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений и топлива для повторного посева.
texts.en:
Jumakhal lives in the Shahrituz region. She is 46 years old, married, and has 4 children. Her husband works as a taxi driver. Jumakhal did not study past high school. She grows vegetables and melons on the small plot of land near her home for a living, and has been doing this for the past 15 years.

Jumakhal is seeking a loan in order to buy mineral fertilizer and fuel for re-seeding.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Umida

texts.ru: Умида проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 28 лет. Она замужем. Муж Умиды находится за рубежом. Сама она более 18 лет занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Умида в основном выращивает овощи для продажи. Она просит кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений. Она хочет посеять и получить хороший урожай.
texts.en: Umida lives in the Shahrituz region. She is 28 years old and married. Her husband is currently abroad. For more than 18 years, Umida has been growing agricultural crops, mainly vegetables that she can sell. Umida is seeking a loan to purchase mineral fertilizer. She wants to plant and reap a good harvest.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es: LA SEÑORA ALEJANDRINA,  VIVE EN LA COMUNIDAD DE  MOLLE AGUADA DE LA  PROVINCIA MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA,  TIENE DOS HIJOS DEPENDIENTE, ALEJANDRINA  SE DEDICA A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA Y EN TIEMPO LIBRE  A LAS ACTIVIDADES DE LABORES DE CASA, EN LA ANTERIOR COSECHA TUVO PROBLEMAS CLIMÁTICOS  DE SEQUÍA Y HELADAS, POR EFECTO, LAS AGUAS  DE RIEGO BAJARON DE CAUDAL AFECTANDO AL RENDIMIENTO DE LA PRODUCCIÓN, ESTE DESASTRE HIZO FRACASAR EN SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS A LA FAMILIA QUE SE MANTENÍAN CON LA PRODUCCIÓN AGRÍCOLA. CADA AÑO PRODUCEN PRINCIPALMENTE MANÍ, FREJOL, PAPA  EN SU PEQUEÑA PARCELA. ALEJANDRINA  ES UNA PERSONA  MUY QUERIDA Y RESPETADA EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVE, POR LO DEDICADO AL TRABAJO AGRÍCOLA Y LABORES DE CASA, CON EL CUAL SACA ADELANTE A SU FAMILIA A SI MISMO COMPLETA SUS NECESIDADES TRABAJANDO DE JORNALERA EN LA AGRICULTURA PARA GANAR ALGUNOS PESOS Y ASÍ MANTENER Y COSTEAR LOS GASTOS DE ESTUDIO DE SUS HIJOS, ELLA ESTÁ SOLICITANDO EL CRÉDITO PARA TERMINAR DE CONSTRUIR SU CASITA QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN OBRA GRUESA, DE ESTA MANERA MEJORARA LA CALIDAD DE VIDA. TRABAJA EN LAS PEQUEÑAS PARCELA QUE TIENE CON TODA SU FAMILIA, QUIERE COMPRAR INSUMOS AGRÍCOLAS PARA MEJORAR LAS CONDICIONES Y QUE EN LAS PRÓXIMAS OPORTUNIDADES REALIZARA INVERSIONES CON CRÉDITOS MAYORES QUE LE PERMITAN EMPRENDER NEGOCIOS CON UTILIDADES DE MAYOR VALOR ECONÓMICO.
texts.en:
Alejandrina lives in Molle Aguada community of the the Mizque province, within the Cochabamba department.  She has two dependents and she works in farming and does household chores in her spare time.  She had climatic problems (cold, drought) during the last harvest.  This disaster caused her investments to fail for the family who supports itself through agricultural production.  Each year they produce mainly peanuts, beans, and potatoes on her small parcel of land.

Alejandrina is a well-liked and respected where she lives, because of her dedication to farming and housework, with which she gets her family ahead and meets her own needs.  She works to earn a few Pesos, maintain her crops, and pay for her children’s education.

She is asking for this loan in order to finish building her small home that is still in the rough stages.  In this way she can improve her quality of life.  She works on her small parcel of land with her family.  She wants to share her farming income to improve conditions and will make investments at the next opportunity that will allow her to start more financially valuable businesses.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Deyanira

texts.es:
Deyanira de 31 años de edad, se desempeña como contadora, ella cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien labora como Ingeniero agronomo, ambos son trabajadores, son cristianos, existe estabilidad laboral, son una familia unida, que han luchado poco a poco por salir adelante y obtener su propia vivienda.  

solicita su crèdito para emberjar su casa (poner protectores de hierro) y comprar 2 puertas y 3 ventanas, en su casa de habitaciòn para brindarle mayor seguridad a su vivienda, ya que como trabaja en el dia pasa la casa sola y desea asegurarla.

Su sueño es que su familia goze de salud y que su hija crezca sana en un ambiente agradable y tener un trabajo digno .
texts.en:
Deyanira, 31, is a bookkeeper.  Her husband is an agricultural engineer.  They are Christians and work hard to maintain a healthy family life.  They have stable jobs and hope to own their own house one day.  

Deyanira is applying for a loan, part of which she will use to make her house more secure (with security gates and window bars) and the rest to buy 2 doors and 3 windows.  She is often home alone during the day and the investment will provide extra security.  

For the future, Deyanira wants good health for her family and a decent life for her daughter.

loans.use: to make her house safer.

loans.name: Jamillo

texts.ru:
Жамилло жительница района Шахритус. Ей 54 года. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Старший сын Жамиллы находится на заработках за рубежом. 
Жамилло занимает животноводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Жамилло разводит скот у себя дома. Животноводством она занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Jamillo lives in the Shahrituz region. She is 54 years old, married, and has 4 children. Her eldest son is working abroad to earn money. Jamillo is involved in animal husbandry. She raises cattle at home for future re-sale, and has been doing this for 6 years. Jamillo is seeking a loan to purchase bulls and calves.

loans.use: to buy bulls and calves

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is married to Marcelo and they have five children. Four of her children are married while the other one is working in Manila.

According to Josefina, a furniture shop has been their primary source of income before. Because of patience, hard work and determination to have a better way of living, she and her spouse were able to start up their variety store and livestock business. Josefina has now been running her variety store for 15 years. She would like to keep her variety store stocked and with complete basic necessities to offer within her local community. She believes that through providing complete basic necessities to her neighborhood she could encourage more customers which will enable her to make enough profit for her family needs.

Josefina request a loan of PHP 7,000 which will be used to buy merchandise for her variety store. She hopes to obtain this loan amount in order to have continuous business growth.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her variety store

loans.name: Shohidin

texts.en: Shohidin is 40 years old and he is a hardworking man with a great desire to be a rich businessman. His lifetime partner is a housewife, and they have five children. He is one of the successful businessmen of his town. For more than 5 years he has been busy selling food items such as pasta, rice, and other products. He wants to develop business further but his income is small and he needs your help and mercy. He is asking for a loan of 5000 somoni to buy food items to sell. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy food items to sell

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 40-year-old married woman. She is a farmer and mainly deals in goat trading. She has been rearing goats since 2000 at her homestead. The increasing demand for goats saw her join this business and she has over 30 goats currently. With the income realised from goat rearing, she has managed to send her children to good schools and construct a permanent house for her family.

Beatrice has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 shillings so that she can be able to rear as many goats as possible which will help her increase her stock of goats since demand for goat meat has gone high and her customers have increased. Her dream is to see all her children graduate from the university. Her major challenge is inadequate space for her goat rearing project. However, she is a very honest and hard-working lady.

loans.use: to purchase more goats to rear for sale

loans.name: Akbar

texts.en:
Akbar is married and has three children to whom he has always wanted to provide a good quality of life. It’s for this reason that he one year ago began his own business with driving. Thanks to the good service, he has managed to gain many customers. Since he’s had his business, his family’s quality of life has been improving, now that his children are able to get a good education and the financial challenges are being solved little by little. He is asking for a loan to repair his car. 

In this way his business will have the opportunity to provide better service and to increase his income which allows him to offer his children and wife a better quality of life and better financial opportunities for getting ahead.

loans.use: To repair car for use as a taxi

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
La joven Concepcion trabaja como docente de primaria en la Escuela Rubèn Darìo # 2 de colonia la Uniòn, todos los dias tiene que viajar en Camiòn  a las 6 de la mañana para llegar su centro de trabajo para impartir el pan de la enseñanza a niños campesinos de su comunidad.  

Solicita su  crèdito para darle mantenimiento a su vivienda, es soltera, vive en la casa de su padres, es muy querida por su familia ya es una mujer muy humilde.

Su sueño es que la trasladen a impartir clases a la zona Urbana de Nueva Guinea, gozar de salud y estar bien en cosas de Dios.
texts.en:
Concepcion works as an elementary school teacher at the Rubèn Darìo # 2 school in Uniòn.  She arrives at 6:00 am daily by bus so that she can provide bread and education to the peasant children of the community.

She is asking for this loan so that she can do maintenance on her home.  She’s single and lives with her parents.  She is very loved by her family because she’s a humble woman.

Her dream is to be transferred to teach in the Nueva Guinea urban zone, be healthy, and be in touch with God.

loans.use: to purchase building materials.

loans.name: Johana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Doña Johana Elizabeth trabaja como Auditora Interna de la Universidad Uraccan desde hace 12 años, ella cuenta con la ayuda economica mensual del padre de sus 2 hijos, esta clienta se siente muy agradecida con la instituciòn ya que el solar donde esta construyendo su casa fue financiado por AFODENIC y ha mejorados su condiciones de vida y de su familia, se caracteriza por ser una mujer servicial y muy trabajadora, es muy querida por sus compañeros de trabajos y vecinos.                                                         

Solicita su  crèdito para pagar la mano de obra ya que  tiene  todo   el material para inicar a construir su vivienda.                                                                    

su sueño es tener su propia vivienda , que sus hijos esten llenos de salud y tener estabilidad laboral para ayudar   a su familia.
texts.en:
Johana Elizabeth has been working as an internal auditor for the University of Uraccan for the past 12 years.  She gets some financial help each month from the father of her two children each month and she is very grateful to the institution because the construction of her house was financed by AFODENIC.  It has helped improve her family’s living conditions.  She is known for being a very hardworking and helpful woman and is very well liked by her coworkers and neighbors.

She is asking for this loan so that she can pay for labor, as she already has all the materials she needs to build her house.

Her dreams are to have her own home; for her children to be healthy; and to have job stability so that she can help her family.

loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en: Reynaldo is a responsible father who has a great ambition for his family. He is 50 years old and has four grown-up children. He is a farmer who owns and manages a corn farming business in their community. He aims to uplift their status of living, to educate his children and give them a better life. Despite financial difficulty, he wants to increase his yields and income to satisfy his family's needs and support their education. To improve his farming business, he is asking for an additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy fertilizers and herbicides needed in corn farming. Through this loan, he believes that he will be able to improve his farming business and hopes that he will have a plentiful harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides needed in corn farming

loans.name: Mahmadkarim

texts.ru: Махмадкарим житель района Хуросон. Ему 27 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Махмадкарим три года как открыл дилерский центр. Он намерен расширить свою деятельность. Махмадкарим просит кредит для покупки сим-карт, мобильных телефонов и для проведения капитального ремонта помещения.
texts.en: Mahmadkarim lives in Khuroson. He is 27 years old, married, and has 2 children. Three years ago, Mahmadkarim opened a sales center, and he is now looking to expand his business. Mahmadkarim is seeking a loan to purchase Sim cards and mobile phones, and to carry out renovations to his business premises.

loans.use: to buy Sim cards and mobile phones, and to carry out renovations to his business premises.

loans.name: Mujeres Victoriosas Group

texts.es:
La señora Rigoberta es casada tiene 34 años, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 5 hijos de los cuales 3 estudian, se dedica a la crianza de animales, inició con el fin de superar y lleva 9 años de experiencia actualmente, espera en el futuro contar con capital amplio.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de animales consistente en pollos de engorde. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio, agropecuario, artesanía.
texts.en:
Rigoberta is married and is 34 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study but of her five children three are in school. She makes a living raising animals. She began with the goal of moving forward and now has nine years of experience. She hopes that in the future she will have greater capital. 

She is part of this group to request a loan that she will use to buy chickens to fatten up. The rest of the members of the group make a living in commerce, livestock and artisan goods.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise.

loans.name: Aly

texts.en: Aly is one of the smart members of his family. He is 45 years old and has a lovely wife Homirat who helps him with his business. They are bringing up 7 children. Aly and his wife try to provide them with a high quality of living conditions. With this aim, 1 year ago he began his own business selling food items. He sells his goods in a store which is near a school. He wants to widen the assortment of his goods and also to buy a car. His income is small and he can’t do it. He is asking for a loan of 3000 USD to buy food items to widen the assortment of goods and a car for his use.  Each month he will make his payment on time. He will be happy if you support him.

loans.use: To buy food items to widen his assortment of goods and a car for his use

loans.name: Zandra

texts.es: La señora Zandra  tiene 53 años, ella vive con su marido, tienen 4  hijos que dependen de ellos, dos hijos son gemelos y tienen 10 años de edad y están en la escuela y otra hija esta a punto de terminar sus estudios de la secundaria, y tiene otro hijo mayor joven que se encuentra muy delicado de salud con problemas de trastornos mentales. El diario vivir de Zandra es muy preocupante debido ala salud de su hijo que diariamente requiere atención y demanda gastos de dinero y  a veces sus recursos ya no le alcanza. Ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos cabañeros, los cuales los cría en corrales rústicos, su esposo trabaja en una empresa de servicios básicos de agua mediante este crédito ella espera mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos, su esposo y de ella.
texts.en: Zandra is 53 years old and lives with her husband.  They have four dependent children; two are ten year old twin boys who attend school.  Another daughter is about to complete junior high school, and their eldest son who is weak because of mental disorders.  Zandra’s daily life if very concerning because of her son’s health.  He needs daily attention and they don’t always have enough money to pay for it.  She raises pigs in rustic pens.  Her husband works at a water services company.  She hopes to be able to improve her husband’s, her children’s, and her own quality of life through this loan.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pottery, filler, cement and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Lindsay

texts.es: Lindsay, de 28 años es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora, tiene una relación de convivencia desde hace muchos años y fruto de esa unión tiene 2 hermosos hijos, vive en su casa propia junto a toda su familia y a diario pone su mayor esfuerzo para salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida. La actividad laboral de Lindsay consiste en la venta zapatos de diferentes tallas modelos y colores. Vende productos de marcas muy reconocidas por su calidad y excelentes modelos que son de preferencia para el público femenino principalmente. Generalmente sus ventas son por perdidos previamente hechos y seleccionados de acuerdo al gusto del cliente. Trabaja en esta actividad mas de 8 años y afortunadamente le va bien. Cumple esta función sola y actualmente lo complementa con la venta de cosméticos aunque en menor rango. Es por eso que quiere incrementar su capital y desarrollar esta función con mayor énfasis. Durante el tiempo de que lleva trabajando aprendió mucho y reforzó algunas técnicas de venta que antes ya conocía, agradece mucho a la vida porque le va bien en todos los aspectos y se siente tranquila por todo lo que tiene, es conciente que tiene que trabajar mucho para poder tener éxito en este tipo de trabajo, espera continuar manteniendo su clientela y así seguir creciendo hasta establecer su propia tienda de zapatos y cosméticos en donde pueda vender más e incrementar sus ingresos. Este es el préstamo número 2 con MFP, está muy agradecida por la oportunidad crediticia que le brindan y por el respaldo financiero que necesita para seguir adelante. Se compromete a pagar sus cuotas mensuales de manera puntual y continua trabajando con mucha responsabilidad junto a los miembros de su banco comunal. Con el monto solicitado (S/. 800), comprará mayor cantidad de mercadería conformada por productos de perfumería y cosméticos para continuar vendiendo e incrementar la cantidad de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lindsay, 28, is an enterprising, very hardworking woman.  She’s been in a relationship for many years and has two beautiful children.  She lives in her own house with her entire family and works hard every day to get ahead and improve her quality of life.

Lindsay’s work activity consists in selling shoes in various sizes, styles and colors.  She sells well-known brands of merchandise that are known for their quality and excellent styles that women in particular prefer.  Her sales are general driven by prior orders places by customers according to their taste.  She’s been in this business for more than 8 years and fortunately does well.  She works alone and currently complements it with cosmetics sales though on a smaller scale.  This is why she wants to increase her capital and develop the cosmetic sales to a larger extent.

During the time she’s been working she’s learned much and has strengthened some of the sales techniques she had previously.  She’s aware that she has to work hard to attain success in this type of business and she hopes to retain her clientele to continue working until she can open her own shoe and cosmetics store where she can sell more and increase her income.

This is her second MFP loan and she’s very grateful for the credit opportunity she’s getting and for the financial backing she needs to continue forward.  She commits to make her monthly payments punctually and to continue working very responsibly with her fellow communal bank members.

She will use the requested 800 soles to buy larger amounts of merchandise comprising perfume and cosmetics to continue selling and increasing the number of her customers.

loans.use: to buy perfume and cosmetics.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria, de 34 años, es una mujer buena, amable y emprendedora, es conviviente con Tito de 40 años quien es su fiel compañero desde hace mucho tiempo, tienen tres hijos a quienes pusieron como nombre Valentina de 14, Milagros de 12 y Alferi de 8 años de edad. Viven en su casa propia y trabaja mucho para brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. El trabajo de Gloria consiste en la venta de abarrotes, su negocio está ubicado en su casa situada en una calle muy transitada de su barrio, desde muy temprano se levanta y abre las puertas de su establecimiento y espera a que vayan sus clientes en busca de comprar de todo y ella se encarga de proveerlos siempre de cosas nuevas ya sean en diversos artículos personales o abarrotes de calidad, siempre brinda una buena atención. Lleva en este negocio 4 años y lo hace con ayuda de pareja. Complementa esta actividad con otras fuentes de ingresos como la venta de diferentes cosméticos que ofrece a través de catálogos y la venta de productos ferreteros que siempre hacen falta en un lugar tan alejado del centro de la ciudad. Le está yendo muy bien en su negocio, ya que vende mucho, además gracias al apoyo de su pareja tiene el tiempo suficiente ya sea para descansar o para brindarle la atención necesaria a sus hijos, espera que su negocio continúe en progreso. Este es el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, por ello agradece a las personas que hacen posible su crédito y le dan la oportunidad de continuar trabajando para lograr sus objetivos, está comprometida al pago puntual de sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad. 
Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará mas mercadería para su negocio, además de mas cosméticos para tener en stock, desea tener todo tipo de artículos para mantener contentos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Gloria, age 34, is a good, kind, and enterprising woman.  She is in a common-law marriage with Tito, age 40.  He has been her loyal companion for a long time.  They have three children, 14 year old Valentina, 12 year old Milagros, and 8 year old Alferi.  They live in their own house, and she works a lot in order to provide her family with better living conditions.

Gloria sells groceries.  Her business is located at her house, which is situated on a very busy street in her neighborhood.  She gets up very early and opens the doors to her establishment.  She waits for her customers to come looking to buy everything.  She is responsible for always providing them with new things, whether it be diverse personal items or quality groceries.  She always provides good service.  She has been in this business for four years, and she does it with help from her life partner.

She supplements this business activity with other sources of income like selling different cosmetics through catalogs.  She also sells hardware products that are always needed in a place so far from the center of the city.  It is going very well for her in her business because she sells a lot.  Also, thanks to the support from her life partner, she has enough time to rest or to give her children the attention they need.  She hopes that her business continues to move forward.

This is her fourth loan with MFP.  She is grateful to the people who make this loan possible and give her the opportunity to continue working in order to achieve her objectives.  She pledges to make her payments punctually and very responsibly.  She will use the requested 2,500 soles to buy more merchandise for her business.  She will also buy more cosmetics to have in stock.  She wants to have all types of items in order to keep her customers happy.

loans.use: to buy more basic needs products and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jeannette

texts.es: Jeannette, de 31 años, es una mujer alegre, amable y trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 8 y 3 años, vive en casa sus suegros en compañía de sus dos hijos y su pareja con quien comparte la responsabilidad de educar y alimentar a sus pequeños niños, ella trabaja mucho pues desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Jeannette tiene un trabajo que consiste en la venta de zapatos, hace sus pedidos de otra ciudad, le envían y se encarga de visitar a sus vecinos, amigos y familiares en busca de venderlos. Ofrece zapatos de buenas marcas, modelos agradables, diseños novedosos, de gran comodidad y de calidad duradera. Lleva haciendo éste trabajo por 3 años y trabaja sola ya que no es necesaria otra persona para el tipo de trabajo que desempeña. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite estar a lado de sus hijos el tiempo necesario para cuidarlos y educarlos, cuando cumple su función laboral realiza buenas ventas debido a que sus clientes confían en los productos que ella ofrece. Afortunadamente tiene muy buenos ingresos que le permite aportar a la economía de su hogar, le gustaría ampliar su negocio y tener una tienda grande en donde pueda ofrecer sus productos con mayor comodidad a sus clientes. Este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, es por eso que agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su crédito para continuar realizando su trabajo con mejores resultados. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas como lo hizo en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos los integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará mas mercadería para seguir con sus ventas, por la temporada de invierno que se avecina comprará botines y tacos para damas, además de algunas zapatillas.
texts.en:
Jeannette, age 31, is a happy, kind, and hard-working woman.  She is in a common-law marriage.  She and her life partner have two children, ages eight and three.  She lives in her mother and father-in-laws’ house with her two children and her life partner with whom she shares the responsibility of raising and feeding their two small children.  

She works a lot because she wishes to provide them with a better quality of life.  Jeannette sells shoes.  She places her orders in another city, and her orders are sent to her.  She takes the responsibility of visiting her neighbors, friends, and family as she looks to sell the shoes.  She sells shoes that are a good brand, attractive, new designs, very comfortable, and of lasting quality.  

She has been doing this work for three years.  She works alone because she does not need another person for the type of work she does.  What she likes about her work is that it allows her enough time to be with her children in order to take care of them and to educate them.  Upon finishing her work she has made good sales because her customers have confidence in the products that she sells.

Fortunately, she has good income that allows her to contribute to the household finances.  She would like to expand her business and have a large store where she would be able to sell her products to her customers more comfortably.

This is her third loan with MFP.  She is grateful to all of the people who make her loan possible in order for her to keep doing her work with better results.  She pledges, once more, to make her payments punctually, like she did with the previous loans that she had.  

Also, it pleases her to be part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people.  She will use the requested 2,500 soles to buy more merchandise to continue with her sales.  For the winter season that is coming she will buy ankle boots with heels for women, and she will also buy some slippers.

loans.use: to buy boots, shoes, and slippers.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia de 56 años de edad, es una mujer empeñosa, sociable, alegre y trabajadora. Es conviviente con Pedro quien se dedica al comercio y  es padre de sus 6 hijos. Vive en compañía de 2 de sus hijos: Percy de 30 años con su esposa y sus 2 hijos; y Pedro de 25 años, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa que construyeron en conjunto gracias al resultado de su esfuerzo laboral. Julia tiene un negocio familiar que realiza con su pareja, siendo ella la administradora del negocio consistente en la compra y venta de pescados al por mayor. Vende a otras ciudades donde los ofrece a sobrecosto, obteniendo mayores ganancias. También cuenta con 2 mototaxis que compró con sus ganancias y los alquila a sus vecinos. Se inició en esta actividad hace más de 5 años por la iniciativa de su pareja quien aprendió a desarrollar este oficio en otra ciudad. La venta solo lo realiza por pedidos de clientes que tienen sus puestos de venta en los principales mercados de la ciudad o en otras ciudades. Afortunadamente le va muy bien y su negocio continúa en proceso de expansión positivamente. Considera a su negocio rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja, que son mayores de su anterior negocio de venta de verduras en el mercado. Le gusta su actividad por el ingreso económico que percibe y que le sirven para ayudar a solventar sus gastos del hogar, además de ver crecer su capital por la demanda y el aumento del precio de este producto por la escasez. Por eso tiene planes de continuar y ampliar su negocio y en un futuro abrir una bodega de abarrotes en casa para que pueda estar en casa y descansar un poco sin desligarse de su trabajo. Este es el crédito número 8 con MFP, agradece a quienes le brindan la oportunidad para acceder a este crédito financiero que le brinda la seguridad para continuar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que no desea dejar una imagen negativa en los miembros de su grupo que se caracterizan por la puntualidad y responsabilidad en sus pagos. El monto solicitado de 1800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de pescado fresco. También realizará el mantenimiento a uno de sus mototaxis para que puedan seguir trabajando en el.
texts.en:
Julia is 56 years old and a very persevering, sociable, happy and hard working woman. She lives with her partner Pedro who makes a living in commerce and is the father of her six children. They live in the company of two of their children: Percy is 30 years old and is married with two children; and Pedro is 25 years old. They are all together in their own house that they build thanks to the result of the hard work. 

Julia has a family business that she runs with her partner. She works in administrating the business which consists of buying and selling fish wholesale. She sells to other cities where she offers them a higher price and obtains greater earnings. She also has two motorcycle taxis that she bought with her earnings and rents to her neighbors. She began this work more than five years ago due to her husband's initiative, who learned this trade in another city. Sales are only made on request by clients who have their stalls in the main markets of the city or in other cities. 

Fortunately it is going very well for her and her business continues to positively expand. She considers her business profitable for the good earnings that she has, which are greater than her previous business selling vegetables in the market. She likes her work because of the income that she receives and because it helps her to cover her household expenses and see her capital grow from the demand and increased price of this product due to scarcity. 

Because of this she has plans to continue and expand her business and in the future open up a grocery store in her house so that she can be in her house and rest a little without missing out on work.

This is her eighth loan with MFP and she is thankful to those that have given her the opportunity to access this loan that will afford her security to continue working. She also is committed once again to fulfill her loan installments punctually since she does not wish to leave her group with a negative image. Her group is characterized for its punctuality and responsibility in payments. The amount that she has requested of 1800 nuevo soles will be invested to buy fresh fish. She will also do maintenance on one of her motorcycle taxis so that they can continue working with it.

loans.use: to buy fish and pay for technical maintenance for her vehicle.

loans.name: Dora Angelica

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de broasteria,la socia vende pollos broster con papas fritas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 7 años en este negocio,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacara adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de broasteria.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pollos y papas fritas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She continues with her Broasted chicken business.  She sells Broasted chickens with fried potatoes from 8am until 7pm.  She’s been in business 7 years and wants to move her children forward by means of this business.  Her dream is to expand the Broasted chicken business and is asking for the loan to buy chickens and fried potatoes.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy chickens and fried potatoes.

loans.name: Willyfred

texts.en: Willyfred used the previous loan to  buy books, paper and other scholastic items to sell.  He is a 32 year-old man, who lives in Kagadi, Uganda. He has five children and a wife whom he alone looks after. For the last eight years, he has operated a business dealing in stationery. He started by working in agriculture, from which he got money and started the stationery business. His main hardship in the business is customers' not paying on time. His goals are to have his children attain a good education, and he would like to expand the business into other markets. Willyfred is requesting for a loan to buy books, pens and reams of paper to sell.

loans.use: to buy books, pens and reams of paper to sell.

loans.name: Timothy

texts.en: Timothy is a 26-year-old married man with one child living in Bundibugyo ,Uganda. He is a teacher and has been in service for one year. Since he has been in the professional he has managed to buy land and pay dowry for his customary marriage. His other income-generating activity is cocoa growing and the crop has a ready market as the processing facilities are only 5 kilometeres from his plantation. His challenged with low salary and his personal goal is building a permanent residential house. The purpose of the loan is to purchase building materials like bricks and cement for his residential house.

loans.use: to purchase building materials like bricks and cement for his residential house.

loans.name: Luka

texts.en: Luka is a 35-year-old married man having 6 children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He has been trading in cocoa for 8 years. His main hardship is seasonal weather changes which limit his profits. Despite this, he has dreams of educating his children to attain degrees as minimum qualification and expanding business into new markets. The purpose of the loan is to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en: Leonard is a 34-year-old married man with 4 children living in Kagadi,Uganda. He is a parish chief in a government institution and has been in service for one year. During this time he has been able to buy land and pay school fees for his children. He grows coffee and other food crops to so as to earn additional income (other than his salary). He would like to educate his children and buy a car. Leonard intends to use the loan to buy bricks, timber, and iron sheeting to build his residential house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, timber, and iron sheeting to build his residential house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La  socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de adornos de navidad y tambien la socia se sigue dedicando a una empresa privada,en el negocio de venta de adornos de navidad la socia se dedica al negocio 5 años en este negocio,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de otros adornos como posavasos,manteles entre otros,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los adornos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar materiales como hilos,lanas y telas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She continues in the business of selling Christmas decorations and also as an employee in a private firm.  She’s been in the Christmas decoration business for five years.  She also sells other decorations like drink coasters and tablecloths, among others.  Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell the decorations.  She’s requesting the loan to buy supplies like thread, yarn and fabric.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies like fabric, yarn and thread.

loans.name: Juan Roberto

texts.es:
El socio sigue estudiando en la universidad la carrera profesional de psicologia,el socio estudia desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,al socio le falta 2 años para terminar de estudiar psicologia,el sueño del socio es terminar de estudiar y ser profesional y salir adelante.El socio solicita el credito para pagar sus estudios de la universidad.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: He continues studying psychology in the university.  He attends classes from 8am until 6pm and only has two more years left to finish his psychology studies.  His dream is to complete his studies, become a professional and get ahead.  He requests the loan to pay his university expenses.  He’s happy about the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to pay his university expenses.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de jugos,ella vende en el mercado en un puesto,la socia prepara jugos de naranja,jugo de papaya y jugos de fresa,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia teiene 8 años en este negocio,la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender jugos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar frutas como naranjas,papaya,fresas y platanos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She continues with her business selling juice in a market stand.  She prepares orange, papaya and strawberry juice from 8am until 6pm.  She’s been in business 8 years and supports her children by means of this business.  Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell her juice.  She’s asking for the loan to buy fruit like oranges, papayas, strawberries and bananas at wholesale.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy fruit like oranges, papayas, strawberries and bananas at wholesale.

loans.name: Kikyo Women Group

texts.en: Julius is a 34-year-old married man with three children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He deals in cocoa and also rides a motorcycle for his transport business. He has been in the transport business for ten years and he used his agriculture profits to buy a motorcycle. The main hardships the client is facing are customers not paying on time and seasonal weather changes that are affecting his cocoa yields. His personal goals are educating his children in better schools and constructing a better house. His business goals are to buy more land for farming and expand his business into new markets. He is a member of the above mentioned group and as per group policy every member guarantees the other in accessing a loan. Julius intends to use the loan to renovate his residential house and harvest his cocoa plantation. He is the one wearing a white shirt and squatting.

loans.use: to renovate his residential house and harvest his cocoa plantation.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses is a 33 year old married man with three children living in Kagadi, Uganda.  He is a teacher by profession and has been in service for three years.  With his limited salary he has been able to buy land and upgrade his studies.  Besides his job, he grows maize and beans and rears goats, which earns him extra income. He would like to educate his children and buy a car.  Moses is requesting for a loan to buy bricks, timber and iron sheets for building his residential house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, timber, and iron sheets for building his residential house.

loans.name: Maimuna

texts.en: Maimuna is a 55-year-old married woman living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She has a clothes shop and has been in this business for three years, after earning profits from cocoa sales. Her main challenge is price fluctuations and the seasonal nature of the business. Her personal goals are educating her children and building a permanent house for the family while the business goal is expanding business into new markets. Maimuna intends to use this loan  to buy new clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy new clothes to sell.

loans.name: Los Comerciantes 2 Group

texts.es:
el señor Carlos Rene esta soltero, tiene 30 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a atender una tienda, inicio este negocio ya que no había tienda en su comunidad y la posibilidad de mejorar sus ingresos.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de productos para ampliación de la tienda que tiene, va a comprar, aguas gaseosas, jugos, golosinas, y otras cosa que son muy vendibles en su tienda. En el futuro espera  tener un local grande y en la orilla del camino para tener mas clientes. Los demás integrantes se dedican al comercio. Uno de los señores en la foto no califico para el préstamo.
texts.en: Carlos Rene is 30 years old and single. He didn't have the opportunity to study. He works running a store. He started this business because he noticed that there was no store in his community and he had the chance to improve his income. He organized a group to be able to apply for a loan, which he will use to buy products to expand the store that he has. He will buy carbonated water, juice, sweets, and other things that sell well in his store. In the future, he hopes to have a large place on the side of the road, to have more customers. The other members work in trade. One of the men in the photo did not qualify for a loan.

loans.use: to buy products for the store

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Lucila, de 44 años, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene seis hijos de 25, 24, 20, 19, 16 y 9 años, aún viven a su lado aunque no todos dependen totalmente de ella para su alimentación y educación, ella tiene una casa propia donde vive junto a sus seis hijos y su cónyuge, trabaja mucho para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El trabajo de Lucila consiste en la venta de comida. Tiene su propio local que consiguió tras muchos años de esfuerzo. Se inició vendiendo en la vereda de su casa en donde instalaba una mesa, un par de sillas y una modesta cocina y a diario atendía a sus ocasionales comensales. Actualmente, tiene un amplio local con mayor cantidad de mesas y donde ofrece mayor variedad de platillos que caracterizan la cocina peruana. Anteriormente trabajaba sola y hoy por hoy tiene trabajaba al lado de dos personas más junto a tu pareja. Lleva trabajando 2 años y está contenta por que le está yendo bien y así puede generar ganancias considerables para el mantenimiento de los gastos básicos de su hogar. Le gusta su trabajo ya que por las mañanas puede utilizar parte de su tiempo para otras actividades fundamentales en su hogar y otras funciones que también son necesarias para el funcionamiento de su negocio. Por fortuna tiene clientes todos los días ya que está ubicada en un lugar muy accesible para el público y esto le permite incrementar sus ingresos a diario y brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, aún se encuentra en proceso de expansión y de remodelación de su establecimiento y espera culminarlo a mediano plazo. Este es el crédito número 13 con MFP, está muy contenta al saber que tiene un apoyo financiero que le brinde la garantía para continuar trabajando con mucha tranquilidad, ella por su parte se compromete a seguir siendo una socia puntual en el pago de sus cuotas así como lo hizo en anteriores créditos que tuvo, asimismo se siente cómoda perteneciendo a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará ingredientes, insumos, utensilios y bebidas como gaseosas y cervezas para continuar con su trabajo ya que desea mantener su clientela contenta y atenderlos mejor.
texts.en:
Lucila, 44, is in a committed relationship with her partner with whom she has six children who are 25, 24, 20, 19, 16 and 9 years of age. They all live with her although not all of them depend on her entirely for their food and schooling. She has her own home where she lives with her six children and partner. She works a lot to provide a better quality of life for her family. Lucila's work consists of food sales. She has her own location which she obtained after many years of effort. She started off selling from the sidewalk in front of her house where she set up a table, a pair of chairs and a modest cooking appliance where she attended daily to the customers who would happen by to eat. 

Currently she has a commodious location with a large number of tables where she offers a greater variety of dishes characteristic of Peruvian cuisine. Formerly she worked alone and these days she has two additional persons working alongside her as well as her husband. She's been working for two years and is happy because it is going well for her and so she is able to generate a considerable income for supporting her household with its basic expenses. She likes her work since in the mornings she is able to use part of her time for other primary activities in her home and handle other functions that are also necessary for the functioning of her business. 

Fortunately she has customers every day since she is located in a highly accessible spot for the public. This allows her to increase her earnings daily and provide better living conditions for her family. She is still in the process of expanding and remodeling her establishment and hopes to finish within the medium term. This is her 13th loan with MFP. She is very happy knowing that she has financial support that guarantees her ability to continue working with much assurance. She for her part commits to continue being a prompt member with her payments as she has done with previous loans she had. Likewise she feels comfortable belonging to her communal bank since all of its members are very responsible and mutually supportive. 

With the requested amount of 2,500 Peruvian soles she will purchase ingredients, supplies, utensils and drinks such as soft drinks and beer in order to continue her work, since she wishes to keep her customers happy and better attend to them.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients, supplies, utensils and drinks such as soft drinks and beer so she may continue her work.

loans.name: Patricia Abigail

texts.es:
La socia Patricia pertenece al banco comunal COMUZONE I ,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de joyas como artes,collares,pulseras todos estos hechos en plata,la socia cuenta con un local para vender su mercaderia a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

  
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como aretes para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Patricia belongs to the “Comuzone I” communal bank and continues with her business selling jewelry like earrings, necklaces and bracelets; all made of silver.  She has a locale where she sells her goods to customers that request them.   She’s been in business for a good length of time and does well thanks to the daily effort she puts into it.  She’s a responsible, determined person who supports her family this way.  She requests the loan to buy merchandise like earrings for her business.  She’s grateful for the loan granted and commits to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like earrings for her business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal COMUZONE I ,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de accesorios para celulares,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende baterias,cargadores entre otros,la socia trabaja de lunes a domingo durante el dia,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de baterias y para comprar algunos viveres para su hogar como arroz y leche.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: She’s a member of the “Comuzone I” communal bank and continues with her business selling mobile phone accessories.  She’s been in business for a good length of time and does well thanks to the daily effort she puts into it.  She sells batteries and chargers, among others.  She works Monday to Sunday during the day.  She’s a responsible, dedicated person who supports her family this way.  She’s requests the loan to buy batteries and also to buy some groceries like rice and milk for her home.  She is grateful for the granted loan and commits to make her installment payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy batteries and to buy some groceries like rice and milk for her home.

loans.name: Patricia Maribel

texts.es:
La socia Patricia Maribel tiene 26 años de edad es casada y tiene 1 hijo,la socia se dedica al negocio de turismo,la socia hace servicio de guia hacia lugares de machupicchu u otros lugares turisticos,la socia tambien vende tickes para vender a los turisticas,la socia ya se dedica 6 años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es tener una agencia de viajes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar tickes,boletos turisticos y carpas para implementar su trabajo de guia de turismo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Patricia Maribel, 26, is married and has a son.  She works in tourism.  She works as a tour guide to places like Machu Picchu and other tourist attractions.  She also sells tickets to tourists.  She’s been in business six years and her dream is to have a travel agency.  She requests the loan to buy tickets, tourist passes and tents to equip her tourist guide business.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy tickets, tourist passes and tents.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece la banco comunal COMUZONE I,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de verduras,la socia vende zanahorias,tomates,cebollas entre otros,la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Cusco ,la socia trabaja de lunes a domingo durante el dia,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que ella saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de zanahorias al por mayor.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: She belongs to the “Comuzone I” communal bank and continues with her business selling vegetables.  She sells carrots, tomatoes and onions, among others.  She sells them in one of Cusco’s markets Monday to Sunday all day.  She’s been in business for years and does well thanks to the daily effort she puts into it.  She’s a responsible person who supports her family this way.  She’s asking for the loan to buy carrots at wholesale.  She feels grateful for the granted loan and commits to make her installment payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy carrots at wholesale.

loans.name: Benon

texts.en:
Thirty-three-year-old Benon is a hardworking man who deals in dry produce, a business he has run for a period of three years. He started this enterprise with the proceeds from maize and beans growing. He says inadequate capital is the main factor affecting the business.

Benon is requesting a loan to buy maize, rice and beans to sell. He would like to buy a car to transport the produce to bigger markets in the future.

loans.use: to buy maize, rice and beans  to sell.

loans.name: Garasiano

texts.en:
Garasiano is a 32-year-old gentleman who deals in a produce business which he has run for a period of four years. He started this business with capital derived from the transport business that he still operates. He says inadequate capital is the major factor affecting the venture.

Garasiano is requesting a loan to buy maize and beans to sell. He would like to build a permanent house for his family and venture into modern farming methods instead of buying from other farmers in the future.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Noah

texts.en: Noah is a thirty-seven-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in clothes for ten years. He also earns an additional income from grazing animals. He normally operates in market stalls of different markets around the region. He hopes to expand his business into the city despite challenges of inadequate capital to meet the increasing demand. Noah intends to use the money to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
EL socio pertenece al banco comunal COMUZONE I ,el socio continua con su negocio de venta de ropa ,el socio viaja cada cierto tiempo a la ciudad de Lima para comprar su mercaderia como pantalones,casacas,polos entre otros como tambien le mandan su mercaderia para que el pueda recibirlo aca mismo,el socio cuenta con un local donde vende su mercaderia  a sus clientes que le solicitan,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que el saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el credito para la compra de mercadera como casacas.
El socio se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: He belongs to the “Comuzone I” communal bank and continues with his business selling clothes.  He travels every so often to Lima to buy merchandise like pants, coats and polo shirts, among others and sometimes the merchandise is shipped to him too.  He has a locale where he sells his goods to customers that request them.  He’s been in business for years and does well thanks to the effort he puts into his business every day.  He’s a responsible, determined person who supports his family this way.  He’s requesting the loan to buy merchandise like coats.  He feels grateful for the granted loan and commits to make his established installment payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like coats.

loans.name: Rina Elena

texts.es:
La socia Rina Elena se dedica al negocio de venta de artesania,la socia vende tejido,chompas y carteras,la socia vende en las diferentes ferias de la ciudad de Cusco,la socia hace trabajos de artesania como ella teje chompas y tambien carteras,la socia se dedica al negocio 5 años,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la artesania.La solicita el credito para comprar lanas de colores y palitos de tejr al por mayor.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Reina Elena works selling crafts.  She sells knitwear, sweaters and purses in various street markets in Cusco.  She makes handicrafts; she knits sweaters and purses.  She’s been in business five years and her dream is to have a locale where she can sell her crafts.  She requests a loan to buy yarn in assorted colors and knitting needles at wholesale.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy yarn in assorted colors and knitting needles at wholesale.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey is a thirty-seven-year-old married man with seven children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling maize flour for six years and his business is located in the trading centre. He hopes to educate his children up to the University and renovate his residential house. His challenge is competition from wholesale traders who buy from farmers directly and eliminate him. Godfrey is requesting money to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize to sell.

loans.name: Qurbonbi

texts.ru: Курбонби жительница Гиссарского района. Ей 41 год. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Курбонби портниха, она более десяти лет занимается шитьем. Курбонби в основном занимается шитьем национальных платьев у себя дома. Она берет кредит для приобретения швейной машинки и покупки тканей.
texts.en: Qurbonbi is a resident of the Gissar district.  She is 41 years old, married and has five children.  Qurbonbi is a seamstress.  She has been involved in sewing for over ten years.  Qurbonbi primarily makes national dresses at home.  She is requesting this loan to purchase a sewing machine and fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and fabrics

loans.name: Urania Marbelly

texts.es: Doña Urania de 32 años, continua siempre con su negocio de ropa nueva, de segunda, zapatos y electrodomésticos que vende en los distintos barrios de la capital y también se está incursionando en el mercado del departamento de Rivas distribuyéndole a una nueva clientela con la ayuda de su esposo, de esa manera mantiene los gastos del hogar y en especial la educación de sus hijos a quienes desea verlos en un futuro a todos siendo unos profesionales de bien. Por tal motivo solicita reiteradamente apoyo de crédito para enriquecer y surtir su capital de trabajo comprando variedad de mercadería entre ellas pantalones camisas vestimenta para niños, zapatos de dama, de caballeros de niños y artefactos electrodomésticos. Así lograra aumentar su economía familiar.
texts.en:
Urania, 32, continues always with her business selling new and used clothes, shoes and home appliances in various neighborhoods in the capital and she’s also making inroads into Rivas Department selling to new customers there with her husband’s help.  This is how she covers household expenses, especially her children’s schooling costs because she wants to see them become successful professionals in the future.  

Because of this she’s once again requesting support from a loan to enrich and stock her working capital purchasing a variety of merchandise like pants, shirts, children’s clothes, women’s, men’s and children’s shoes and home appliances.  She will increase her family income this way.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, children's clothes, women's, men's and children's shoes and home appliances.

loans.name: Abdumubin

texts.ru:
Абдумубин житель города Исфара. Ему 31 год. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Абдумубина работает организации "Баракат". Сам Абдумубин имеет средне – специальное образование. По специальности он строитель и кафельщик. Абдумубин работает по специальности. Он предоставляет свои услуги жителям города уже четыре года. 
Абдумубин просит кредит для приобретения стройматериалов.
texts.en: Abdumubin is a resident of the city of Isfara.  He is 31 years old, married and has three children.  His wife works at the "Barakat" organization.  Abdumubin has a secondary-specialized education.  He is a construction worker and a tile installer.  Abdumubin works in his field.  He has been providing his services to the city's residents for four years.  Abdumubin is requesting this loan to purchase construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Sayfiddin

texts.ru: Сайфиддин проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 30 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Жена Сайфиддина домохозяйка. Сам он строитель. Он зарабатывает строительными работами по найму. В этой области Сайфиддин уже пять лет. Он берет кредит для покупки стройматериалов.
texts.en: Sayfiddin lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 30 years old, married and has two children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Sayfiddin is a construction worker.  He earns a living by doing contractor work.  Sayfiddin has been in this field for five years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Sahob

texts.ru: Сахоб проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 56 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Сахоб занимается купле – продажей сухофруктов. Торговлей он занимается 25 лет. Сахоб хочет расширить свою деятельность. Он просит кредит для покупки сухофруктов.
texts.en: Sahob lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 56 years old, married and has four children.  Sahob is involved in buying and selling dried fruits.  He has been in sales for 25 years.  Sahob wants to expand his business.  He is requesting this loan to purchase dried fruits.

loans.use: to purchase dried fruits

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: Lucy, de 29 años, es una mujer buena, amable y trabajadora, es conviviente con Atilio de 44 años y tiene tres hijos, Víctor de 22, Lucy de 18 y el engreído de la casa Alex de solo 4 años, ella vive a lado de su familia en su casa propia y trabaja mucho para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a cada uno de ellos. El trabajo de Lucy consiste en la venta de bebidas, tiene un proveedor que se encarga de llevarle los pedidos a su casa, realizó un convenio con esa empresa que le da a precio mayorista y le deja desde bebidas gaseosas hasta bebidas alcohólicas que lógicamente ella vende solo a personas con mayoría de edad, además tiene el arte de la decoración en sus manos y lo aprovecha vendiendo postres. Lleva realizando su trabajo por más de 4 años y lo hace sola. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, se siente a gusto pudiendo repartir su tiempo entre las actividades de su casa, sus hijos y su negocio, está muy contenta de tener tan buenos ingresos ya que le permite pensar en ampliar su negocio y poner una fuente de soda que está segura lo hará mas adelante. Este es el crédito número 2 con MFP, está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que le están brindando ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a continuar pagando puntualmente sus cuotas tal como le programen, está muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para seguir con la preparación de sus postres, además comprará bebidas de todo tipo, marca y presentación ya que desea incrementar su stock de ventas.
texts.en:
Lucy, 29, is a good, kind, hardworking woman.  She lives with Atilio, 44, and has three children: Víctor, 22, Lucy, 18 and the quite spoiled, four-year-old, Alex.  She lives with her family in her own house and works hard to provide each one of them with a better quality of life.  

Lucy’s work consists in selling beverages.  She has a supplier who delivers her orders to her house.  She made an agreement with this firm which gives her wholesale prices and delivers beverages ranging from soft-drinks to alcoholic beverages which logically she only sells to adults.  She also has very skilled hands so she applies her skills to selling desserts.  She’s been in business four years and she works alone.  She enjoys her work very much and feels good being able to divide her time between her household chores, her children and her business.  She’s very happy to earn such good income because it allows her to think about expanding her business and opening a soda fountain; she’s convinced that she’ll do it later on.

This is her second MFP loan and she’s happy about the financial support she’s being offered because she’ll feel more confident about advancing with her work.  On the other hand, she commits to continue making her installment payments as scheduled.  She’s very happy to belong to her communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive.

She will use the requested 1,500 soles to buy ingredients and supplies to continue making her desserts and will buy beverages of various types, brands and presentations because she wants to increase stock.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her desserts and also to buy all types of beverages.

loans.name: Luceros De Patachaj Group

texts.es:
